name: Clara Archive
summary: Learn about .CLARA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Clara.io is a 3D graphics program published by Exocortex Technologies. You can access Clara.io using a web browser; free and paid versions are available.

Primarily, you can use Clara.io to create and export 3D scenes and models. The program can save 3D models in a variety of formats, including .FBX, .STL, and .OBJ. However, Clara.io's default, proprietary 3D model format is the Clara Archive format.

description: A CLARA file is a 3D model created by Clara.io, a web-based 3D graphics program. It is often saved in a folder or .ZIP file along with associated .JPG files, which are used to skin the model. CLARA files can be opened only in Clara.io.

instructions: You can open a CLARA file in Clara.io (Web). To do so, open the Clara.io editor and select File â†’ Import Files.... Then, navigate to and open your CLARA file.
